name: Clown Camp: Winter Party
description:
It's winter and Mitzy is ready to have some fun! She decides to host a winter party for her friends! Although, she cannot do it alone. With the help of her "best" friend Hellebore, can they get everything for the party? Hopefully!

Clown Camp Winter Party was made for the Winter Game Jam 2022! As my second completed game jam entry, I had a lot of fun with it! I hope you enjoy it! The current build of the game does not have music, but does have Sound Effects.
